title: Chilli and coriander stir-fried prawns

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a wok, add the prawns and chilli and fry for one minute.
Add the blanched asparagus to the wok and stir fry for 1-2 minutes. Add the coriander and lime juice and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve immediately
